name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee, v. Clarence V. SAUNDERS, Appellant

judges: Before JONES, C. J., and EAGEN, O’BRIEN, ROBERTS, POMEROY, NIX and MANDERINO, JJ.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee, v. Clarence V. SAUNDERS, Appellant.
attorneys: Josephine A. Nelson, Philadelphia, for appellant.

F. Emmett Fitzpatrick, Dist. Atty., Richard A. Sprague, 1st Asst. Dist. Atty., Steven H. Goldblatt, Asst. Dist. Atty., Chief, Appeals Division, Philadelphia, William C. Turnoff, Asst. Dist. casebody.head_matter:
336 A.2d 879
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee, v. Clarence V. SAUNDERS, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Submitted Nov. 27, 1974.
Decided May 13, 1976.
Josephine A. Nelson, Philadelphia, for appellant.
F. Emmett Fitzpatrick, Dist. Atty., Richard A. Sprague, 1st Asst. Dist. Atty., Steven H. Goldblatt, Asst. Dist. Atty., Chief, Appeals Division, Philadelphia, William C. Turnoff, Asst. Dist. Atty., Mark Sendrow, Asst. Dist. Atty., Assistant Chief, Appeals Division, Abraham J. Gafni, Deputy Dist. Atty., for Law, for appellee.
Before JONES, C. J., and EAGEN, O’BRIEN, ROBERTS, POMEROY, NIX and MANDERINO, JJ.
